text: The women's 4 x 400 metres relay event at the 1999 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Göteborg, Sweden, at Ullevi on 31 July and 1 August 1999. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Tatyana Levina Irina Yemelyanova Marina Grishakova Svetlana Pospelova ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Nicole Marahrens Anika Ahrens Ulrike Urbansky Claudia Marx ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Ramona Popovici Anca Safta Andrea Burlacu Otilia Ruicu ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 1 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Nation !! Competitors !! Time !!
